cleaning.description: We import and process all your CSV files, APIs, and blockchain records. We reconcile balances, identify duplicates, fix formatting errors, and unify naming conventions across platforms.

calculation.title: Certified tax calculation
calculation.description: We apply FIFO methodology according to AEAT criteria, calculate taxable bases for capital gains and losses, capital income (staking, lending), and other patrimonial increases according to current regulations.

delivery.title: Final report and review
delivery.description: We deliver a complete tax report with annexes for your income tax return, a visual breakdown of operations, and a personalized review session with our team. Everything explained, everything justified.
